author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...COSME FORECAST TO BECOME A REMNANT LOW ON WEDNESDAY...
summary: ...COSME FORECAST TO BECOME A REMNANT LOW ON WEDNESDAY... As of 8:00 PM MST Tue Jun 10 the center of Cosme was located near 15.9, -114.9 with movement NNE at 5 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1005 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 45 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...COSME FORECAST TO BECOME A REMNANT LOW ON WEDNESDAY... As of 8:00 PM MST Tue Jun 10 the center of Cosme was located near 15.9, -114.9 with movement NNE at 5 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1005 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 45 mph.

title: Summary for Tropical Storm Cosme (EP3/EP032025)
